Huk Icon X Hoodie: A Performance shirt that not only looks great but is comfortable and built with a durable poly-knit construction with mesh underarm and back SUN ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $24.60
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:19:38 UTC – Details)


Huk: Uniting anglers through performance-engineered, technical gear designed to fuel your passion and pursuit no matter when, where or how you fish. Huk Icon X Hoodie: A Performance shirt that not only looks great but is comfortable and built with a durable poly-knit construction with mesh underarm and back SUN PROTECTION: This fishing shirt protects your skin from the sun’s harmful rays – Huk added the most advanced sun-blocking +50 UPF materials to their apparel to block both UVA and UVB rays MOISTURE TRANSPORT: Keeping dry is critical to keeping warm on the cold water – Hydrophobic or “water-hating” quality within the fibers of this fishing shirt, transport sweat away from skin to the exterior of the shirt where it can evaporate efficiently I.C.E. Technology: I.C.E. (Internal Cooling Element) is a next to skin technology that creates a cooling effect. Fabrics feel cooler to the touch, work to wick perspiration away from you skin, and dry at a more rapid rate to help cool your body
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 11.65 x 9.96 x 1.02 inches; 14.39 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ H1200384
Department ‏ : ‎ Mens
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 8, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Huk
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09FQG2JXR

Imported
Pull On closure
Machine Wash
Huk: Uniting anglers through performance-engineered, technical gear designed to fuel your passion and pursuit no matter when, where or how you fish
Huk Icon X Hoodie: A Performance shirt that not only looks great but is comfortable and built with a durable poly-knit construction with mesh underarm and back
SUN PROTECTION: This fishing shirt protects your skin from the sun’s harmful rays – Huk added the most advanced sun-blocking +50 UPF materials to their apparel to block both UVA and UVB rays

These start out as a classic button, zip fly, 2 front pocket, 2 rear zip pocket, 1 cargo short, but that where normal stops. This classic 10.5″ short is super-comfortable and has ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $32.64
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:24:26 UTC – Details)


The Huk Next Level 10.5″ Short: Any day is a good day when you get to wear shorts. These start out as a classic button, zip fly, 2 front pocket, 2 rear zip pocket, 1 cargo short, but that where normal stops. This classic 10.5″ short is super-comfortable and has a ton of tech and performance built in them. Huk uses a lightweight, quick dry, UPF +30 stretch fabric gusseted crotch to keep your mobility at a premium. Rear yoke includes laser perforation to further enhance the quick dry / breathability of these shorts. Lastly, Huk added an adjustable waistband for a perfect fit. On the boat, dock or just hanging around town, these will make your day a little better and always have you at the ready to fish. At Huk, we unite all anglers through performance-engineered, technical gear designed to fuel your passion and pursuit no matter when, where or how you fish.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8 x 8 x 2 inches; 8 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ H2000011
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 24, 2018
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Huk
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07GSYZY98

Imported
Button closure
Machine Wash
Huk | Uniting anglers through performance-engineered, technical gear designed to fuel your passion and pursuit no matter when, where or how you fish
NEXT LEVEL 10.5″ SHORT – This fishing short protects your skin from the sun’s harmful rays and is quick drying ensuring all day comfort | 10.5″ length falls at the knee
TECHNICAL PERFORMANCE FISH SHORT – The Next Level incorporates perforated back yoke, zippered back pocket, plyer and cargo pockets and gusseted crotch for maximum mobility; you’ll never want to fish without this fully featured short again

Cool Gifts for Men Women On Many Gift-giving Occasions – The LED flashlight gloves are great gadgets and tools that you never thought you needed, but can make your life easier because the LED gloves can illuminate the darkness like a handy flashlight and let you focus on the work. With a pretty gift package, the flashlight gloves are the perfect gift ideas for men, women, dad, husband, boyfriend as birthday gifts, Valentine’s Day Gifts, Father’s Day Gifts, Christmas gifts, Stocking Stuffers.
One Size Fits Most, Stretchy for Large Hands – The fingerless flashlight gloves are made of stretchy fabric, and with lengthened straps they can fit most adult men’s or women’s fingers and wrist. The cool flashlight gloves are useful gadgets for handyman, car lovers, electricians, engineers, mechanics, plumbers, truck drivers, delivery men when work at dark spaces. The lighted gloves are also helpful for fishing, outdoor running, camping, hiking, dog walking in the early morning or at dusk.
Gifts Under $20/30 for Men/Women Who Have Everything – With bright lights at your fingertips, it’s like having an assistant holding a LED flashlight for you. The LED light gloves will come in handy for seeing at night when grilling/ BBQ, dog walks, night snow shoveling, working on/ under vehicles, and endless possibilities. The cool gadgets plus personalized gifts are under 20 dollars but can beat much more expensive gifts. Ideal small gifts for men women who have everything and hard to buy.

LED Flashlight Gloves Provide A Third Helping Hand. The Perfect Solution for Those Dark Moments

Sometimes you may be working on something that requires you to use both hands and it’s already dark where you can’t hold a flashlight and still work.

It may be riding your bike, doing some tasks in the garage, outdoors, or inside your house.

Well, there you should not worry anymore because you can use PARIGO LED flashlight gloves which you just put on your hands,

illuminate for you and work comfortably.

WHY PARIGO LED FLASHLIGHT GLOVES?

  • Keep your hands-free to focus on your work
  • The upgrade LED light is more directed adequate for your task
  • The batteries are replaceable that the LED fishing gloves can be reused for a long time
  • Stretchable finger-less gloves. One size fits most.
  • Cool gadget gifts ideas for men & women

HOLIDAY GIFTS GUIDE. PERSONALITY GIFTS WRAP.

PARIGO LED Flashlight Gloves Are Cool Gifts for Men/ Women On Many Gift-giving Occasions:

Birthday Gifts for men, Christmas Gifts for dad, Stocking Stuffers for brothers, Anniversary Gifts for husband wife or couples,

Thanksgiving Day Gifts for friends, Father’s Day gifts for dad, Mother’s Day gifts for mom, Valentine’s Day Gifts for him, and more.

Who Will Be Happy To Receive These Unique Gifts?

Marvel Gifts for Male/ female. Novelty Birthday Gifts for men Women. Unusual Birthday Gifts for Husband from wife.

Father’s Day Gifts for Dad from Daughter or Son. Cool Gifts for New Dad/ Step Dad/ Father in Law. Geek Gifts for Boyfriend or guys.

Gifts for Grandpa / elderly from grand child. Gag Gifts for Teen young brothers. White elephant gifts for adults or teenagers, niece or nephew. Housewarming gifts for friends or coworkers. Practical birthday gift ideas for dad who wants nothing and hard to buy. Xmas Santa presents for men. Valentines day gifts for him husband. Awesome Easter gifts for young tween. Fishing gifts for men unique gadget. Truck driver gifts for men.

Emergency flashlight for delivery men. Boating gifts for men dad. Useful lighting gadget for women who like knitting or DIY.

For Indoor Outdoor Use

The PARIGO lighted gloves are convenient and handy finger-less gloves with 2 LED lights built on index and thumb fingers.

It is multi-functional and can be used for many activities during the night, such as reading in the bed or working on a computer without turning on the lights and disturbing the roommate, repairing car jeep motorcycle in the garage, dog walking, patrol, fishing, hunting, riding and many more.

Thus the hand light gloves are also cool gifts for outdoorsman, camper, biker, hiker who love outdoor activities in the early morning or at dusk including running, hiking, camping, hunting, fishing, cycling, and more.

WHAT WILL LED FLASHLIGHT GLOVES BRING TO US?

  • Ample light for outdoor activities like fishing, cycling
  • The lights on fingertips can free the hands when working or repairing
  • Provide a good view while we’re running
  • Offer adequate lights for us to focus on things

Soft and Stretchy – One Size Fits Most

The PARIGO LED lighted gloves are made of premium spandex material which is lightweight, soft, and stretchable. So it can fit most adults or teens’ fingers.

The elastic fastening strap helps secure the LED gloves around the wrist.

Fingerless Gloves – Comfortable and Handy

The fingerless gloves will not hinder the movements of your fingers even when you are doing fine art & crafts, knitting, sewing or repairing. So it’s a cool gadget for men and women who often need extra lights when working with their hands.

What You Will Receive

1. one pair of flashlight gloves

2. with preinstalled cell batteries (common CR2016)

3. and 4 extra batteries (2 for each glove)

4. a storage pouch

5. user manual

6. beautiful gift box
